charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1101_0100_:
While [Name:PlayerNickname ] was out
exploring, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Korrina in the forest.
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_0200_: Ready or not, here I come!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_0800_:
Don’t startle me like that! I’m playing
hide-and-seek with Marshadow right now!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_0900_:
Oh, but this isn’t all fun and games. I’m training
my ability to sense the presence of others!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_1200_:
Hehe... I couldn’t do it. Looks like I need to
practice some more.
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_1300_: Marshadow, where are you? I give up!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_1400_:
What?! You were hiding in my shadow the
whole time?!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_1500_:
You were so close by, yet I didn’t notice you
at all...
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_1600_:
I know! [Name:PlayerNickname ], let me tell
you more about Marshadow...
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_1800_:
Rushing to hide in my shadow... This reminds me
of when we first met!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_0401_2000_: You’re curious? Sure, I’ll tell you more!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_0402_2200_: Yeah! I still remember it like it was yesterday!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_2300_:
It happened around the time I left Kalos on a
journey to train myself.
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_2400_:
I had just finished roller skating practice and was
about to take a break...
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_2500_:
Then, all of the sudden, Marshadow popped right
out of my shadow!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_2600_: I was so surprised, I almost fell over!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_2700_:
Before I knew what was going on, Marshadow
began mimicking my movements.
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_2800_:
At first I was frustrated. I felt like my moves were
being stolen.
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_2900_:
But then I realized, the fact that Marshadow was
mimicking me...
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_3000_: must mean that it had taken an interest in me!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_3200_:
I took an interest in Marshadow as well, and I
wanted to befriend it right away.
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_3300_:
Now we’re a terrific sync pair, and we keep on
motivating each other to get even better!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_3400_:
Hey... C’mon, Marshadow! How long do you plan
on hiding? Come on out!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_3900_: My Marshadow is just a bit shy.
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_4000_:
I don’t think it’s scared or dislikes you or anything
like that!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_4100_:
In fact, if Marshadow didn’t like you, it wouldn’t
try to mimic you.
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_4200_:
I love every part of Marshadow’s personality,
even when it’s shy!
charaepi_ch0012_10_corni/2301_1201_4500_:
Maybe it’ll slip into your shadow and mimic
you next!
